traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The ssurran can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The ssurran makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Bomb
entries: The ssurran throws a tangerine-sized bomb at a point up to 60 feet away, where it explodes, releasing a 10-foot-radius sphere of poisonous gas that disperses quickly. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the ssurran throws a bomb, roll a {@dice d6}; on a roll of 4 or lower, the ssurran has no more bombs to throw.
